properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
MARTINIQUE.
DNC 25.
52 FOOT F/V GLORIOUS, EIGHT PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN
14-39N 062-03W AT 070215Z NOV. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 59 659 670 9292,
FAX: 59 659 663 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU
